title: berlin logo
content:
Can’t seem to nail this one down ... specifically interested in the ’b”

Is it custom?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [4.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20090902181958/http:/typophile.com/files/4_4.jpg) | 17.03 KB |
author: Joshua

comments.content:
These two will come close:

ITC Bauhaus? The ’B’ & ’e’ was closed, and dot on the ’i’ removed.

Or, Chalet PAris 1970, weight added, ’i’ dot removed. [http://www.houseind.com/fonts/chalet](http://web.archive.org/web/20090902181958/http:/www.houseind.com/fonts/chalet "http://www.houseind.com/fonts/chalet")

[Rezland](http://web.archive.org/web/20090902181958/http:/www.dafont.com/font.php?file=rezland&page=1&nb_ppp_old=50&text=berlin&nb_ppp=50&psize=l&classt=alpha) by Fraser Davidson if you want an exact match. :)
